sn48.59:1.2: “Pancimani, bhikkhave, indriyani bhavitani bahulikatani anuppannani uppajjanti, nannatra tathagatassa patubhava arahato sammasambuddhassa.
sn48.59:1.5: imani kho, bhikkhave, pancindriyani bhavitani bahulikatani anuppannani uppajjanti, nannatra tathagatassa patubhava arahato sammasambuddhassa”ti.
